we are currently seeing the same pattern play out over a year later.. there are no guarantees in this market but a rally from 126.5 to 182 (roughly 44 % gain) may follow if we bounce here.🎯

Like most other established altcoins, Litecoin has recently seen significant price gains. However, unlike the heavyweight contenders Bitcoin and Ethereum, LTC is still far from its all-time highs reached in 2021. Whether Litecoin will ever revisit these highs remains uncertain. Nevertheless, there is currently a clear and pronounced hidden bullish divergence... There is a high probability that gold will be positioned around the short-term moving average for range consolidation. The key support is focused on the 2146 line and the resistance 2195.
